overview: "Caminho de Milagres" is the second live album by Aline Barros.  The CD was recorded on November 25, 2006, in Rio de Janeiro. And the DVD was recorded on June 7, 2008 at Maracanãzinho. The album won the Latin Grammy for "Best Christian Music Album in Portuguese Language" in 2007.
title: Caminho de Milagres (Ao Vivo no Maracanãzinho)
